responses: Hi there, what can I do for you?
Hi there, how can I help?
See you later, thanks for visiting

patterns: What kinds of items are there?
How many AP classes should I take?
How many AP classes must I take?
How many AP classes can I take?
Is there a limit in taking AP courses?
Is it ok to take more than 2 AP courses in 10th grade?
Is it ok to take more than 4 AP courses in 11th grade?
Is it ok to take more than 4 AP courses in 12th grade?
What should I do to take more AP courses?
responses: Students should take no more than 2 in 10th grade and no more than 4 in 11th and 12th grade. Any more than that and students tend to be too stressed to be able to perform well in their classes. For students who want to take 5 APs in 11th or 12th grade, they must apply prior to registration and get approval by an Academic Review Board, composed of current teachers and administrators.
